feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2024-02-28T00:24:57.996689Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;任天堂正在起诉 Switch 模拟器 Yuzu 的创建者</stitle>; <id>;https://overkill.wtf/nintendo-sue-yuzu-emulator/</id>; <updated>; 2024-02-27T22:24:55.823022Z</更新>; <link href="https://overkill.wtf/nintendo-sue-yuzu-emulator/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;brandrick</名称>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=brandrick</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://overkill.wtf/content/images/ 2024/02/yuzu-switch-lawsuit.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;美国任天堂正在起诉 Yuzu 的创作者侵犯版权，声称该模拟器助长盗版。任天堂要求赔偿损失并关闭模拟器，因为它绕过了游戏的保护系统。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nintendo-is-suing-the-creators-of-switch-emulator-yuzu" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39530203" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Airfoil</stitle>; <id>;https://ciechanow.ski/airfoil/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T17： 24:55.825097Z</updated>; <link href="https://ciechanow.ski/airfoil/"/>; <作者>; <name>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ciechanow.ski/images/og/airfoil.png" style="width: 220px; height : 116 像素;" />;<br />;本文探讨了飞行的物理原理，重点关注机翼形状和方向如何让飞机保持在空中。它还深入研究了使用箭头、标记和颜色等各种方法来可视化气流。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#airfoil" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 39526057" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;测试容器</stitle>; <id>;https://testcontainers.com/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T23:24:55.825648Z</更新>; <link href="https://testcontainers .com/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;floriangosse</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=floriangosse</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;<img src="https://testcontainers.com/images/hero-illustration/laptop.svg" style="宽度：220px；高度：178px；" />;<br />;Testcontainers 提供一次性 Docker 容器实例进行测试，无需复杂的设置，确保测试环境一致。它支持多种语言，并拥有一个支持其发展的社区。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#testcontainers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 39531536" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;SuperTux</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/SuperTux/supertux</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T20:24:55.826161Z</更新>; <link href="https: //github.com/SuperTux/supertux"/>; <author>; <name>;floriangosse</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=floriangosse</uri>; </author>; <内容类型=“html”>; <img src =“https://camo.githubusercontent.com/a000e64a070a28c3ee44a019e35c1119a01c36ec6a7dbaff62410ddba9f006fb/68747470733a2f2f7777772e73757065727475782e6 f72672f696d616765732f305f365f302f305f365f305f332e706e67"样式="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;SuperTux 是一款受《超级马里奥》启发的平台游戏，玩家引导 Tux 穿越各个世界，从敌人 Nolok 手中拯救 Penny。该游戏是免费的，支持各种控制器，并收到积极的社区贡献。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#supertux" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 39528726" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;您需要的只是广泛事件，而不是“指标、日志和跟踪”</stitle>; <id>;https:// /retrocomputing.stackexchange.com/questions/29565/does-this-8088-code-in-the-leisure-suit-larry-2-game-actually-do-anything</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T21 ：24：55.827192Z </更新>; <link href =“https://retrocomputing.stackexchange.com/questions/29565/does-this-8088-code-in-the-leisure-suit-larry-2-game-实际上做任何事情”/>; <作者>; <名称>;Luc</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Luc</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#does-this-8088-code-in-the-leisure-suit-larry-2-game-do-anything" target="_blank" >;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39530113" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;展示 HN：我为和 7 岁的孩子一起观看外语视频而制作的 AI Dub 工具</stitle>; <id>;https://speakz.ai</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T22:24:55.827704Z</更新>; <link href="https://speakz.ai"/>; <author>; <name>;leobg</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=leobg</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Speakz 是一个工具，将视频配音成不同的语言，同时保留原始语音和声音，这些视频是为个人使用而创建的，现在可以帮助创作者接触到更广泛的受众。它可以快速处理翻译，支持多种语言，并且可以提供实惠的定价计划。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-ai-dub-tool-i-made-to-watch-foreign-language-videos-with-my-7-yearold" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39512912" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;美国对 UnitedHealth 发起反垄断调查</stitle>; <id>;https: //www.wsj.com/health/healthcare/us-launches-antitrust-investigation-of-healthcare-giant-unitedhealth-ff5a00d2</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T22:24:55.828224Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.wsj.com/health/healthcare/us-launches-antitrust-investigation-of-healthcare-giant-unitedhealth-ff5a00d2"/>; <作者>; <name>;moose_man</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=moose_man</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;请启用JS并禁用任何广告拦截器<a href="https:// /hackernews.betacat.io/#us-launches-antitrust-investigation-of-unitedhealth" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=39530487" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;测试 F-35C 尾钩</stitle>; <id>;https://the-engi-nerd.github.io/posts/welcome/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T16:24 :55.828738Z</updated>; <link href="https://the-engi-nerd.github.io/posts/welcome/"/>; <作者>; <name>;sklargh</name>; <uri>;https:// /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sklargh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://the-engi-nerd.github.io/posts/welcome /images/clipboard-270015806.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 140px;" />;<br />;本文叙述了作者在航母适用性测试期间处理 F-35C 尾钩设计问题的经验，重点介绍了最初的失败和随后为有效接合拦阻丝而进行的重新设计。文章以一次激烈的测试事件结束涉及 F-35C 的硬着陆和后续程序审查。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#testing-the-f-35c-tailhook" target="_blank">;[summary]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39525243" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;纯编程语言</stitle>; <id>;https://agraef.github.io/pure-lang/</id >; <更新>;2024-02-27T19:24:55.829256Z</更新>; <link href="https://agraef.github.io/pure-lang/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;tosh</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tosh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://agraef.github.io/ pure-lang/images/DragonSmall.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;Pure 是一种函数式编程语言，具有模式匹配和符号重写等高级功能，使用 LLVM 进行 JIT 编译。它是 Q 的更快后继者，具有广泛的集成选项，并且从 Bitbucket 迁移到GitHub。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#pure-programming-language" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=39526922" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;蚂蚁地缘政治</stitle>; <id>;https://aeon.co/essays/the-strange-and-turbulent-global-world-of-ant-geopolitics</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T14:24:55.831290Z</更新>; <link href="https://aeon.co/essays/the-strange-and-turbulent-global-world-of-ant-geopolitics"/ >; <作者>; <名称>;romaintailhurat</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=romaintailhurat</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src= “https://images.aeonmedia.co/user_image_upload/2864/insert-98657943-invicta51.jpg?width=3840&quality=75&format=auto” style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;来自中美洲和南美洲的一小群蚂蚁在全球范围内扩张，形成了庞大的社会，并通过在竞争中击败本地物种来影响生态系统。欧洲的勘探和贸易促进了它们的传播，它们形成了“匿名”基于化学识别的社会。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ant-geopolitics" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news .ycombinator.com/item?id=39523495" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;我把我的开源项目变成了全职业务</stitle>; <id>;https://docs.emailengine.app/how-i-turned-my- open-source-project-into/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T10:24:55.832236Z</更新>; <link href="https://docs.emailengine.app/how-i-turned- my-open-source-project-into/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;andris9</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=andris9</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://docs.emailengine.app/content/images/2022/12/EmailEngine_logo_vert.png" style="width: 220px; height: 132px;" />;<br />;作者回顾了他们从严格使用开源软件的宽松许可证到为他们的 EmailEngine 项目采用商业许可证的历程，这导致了更有利可图和可持续的商业模式。他们最初拒绝了财政支持并优先考虑影响范围，但后来在意识到他们的贡献缺乏补偿后转向将他们的工作货币化。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-turned-my-open-source-项目进入a-full-time-business" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39522348" target="_blank ">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;/unblock来自无浏览器的 API：作为服务躲避机器人检测</stitle>; <id>;https://www.browserless.io/blog/2024/02/26/unblock-api/?apcid=00620de59ffc742367908900&utm_campaign=unblock-api-announcement&utm_content= unblock-api-announcement&utm_medium=email&utm_source=ortto</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T18:24:55.832749Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.browserless.io/blog/2024/02 /26/unblock-api/?apcid=00620de59ffc742367908900&utm_campaign=unblock-api-announcement&utm_content=unblock-api-announcement&utm_medium=email&utm_source=ortto"/>; <author>; <name>;keepamovin</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=keepamovin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.browserless.io/static/f7d167bfab98efe2ec91fa6ca07ccd61/9585e/unblock-API。 jpg" 样式="宽度:220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了传统机器人屏蔽技术的局限性，并介绍了一个新的 /unblock API，该 API 可以修改 Chrome DevTools 协议层的浏览器行为以避免检测。该 API 允许更人性化的操作例如浏览器大小和设置，减少机器人流量赠品。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-unblock-api-from-browserless-dodging-bot-detection-as-a-service"目标="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39526797" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;SpaceX 在清除 FAA 障碍时披露了星舰异常的原因</stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica.com/space/2024/02/faa-closes-starship-inquiry-and-spacex-details-causes-of-november-accidents/</id>; <更新>;2024-02- 27T13:24:55.833264Z</更新>; <link href="https://arstechnica.com/space/2024/02/faa-closes-starship-inquiry-and-spacex-details-causes-of-november-accidents /"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rbanffy</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rbanffy</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;< img src="https://cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/F_VbEJcbQAAv3Ak-760x380.jpg" style="宽度：220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;FAA 结束了对 SpaceX 星舰事故的调查，接受了 SpaceX 的根本原因和纠正措施。SpaceX 必须在下次发射前实施更改并获得 FAA 许可证修改。 <a href="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/#spacex-discloses-cause-of-starship-anomalies-as-it-clears-an-faa-hurdle" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39523403" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Blazer：商业智能变得简单</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/ankane/blazer</id>; <updated>;2024 -02-27T14:24:55.833765Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/ankane/blazer"/>; <作者>; <name>;tosh</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tosh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/783368f9610fcf4b8727603a35c7bbf4ddf9d24ca0deda713fe46eacee8858f4/68747470733a2f2f626c61 7a65722e646f6b6b756170702e636f6d2f6173736574732f626c617a65722d613130626161343066656631636132663562623235666339376263663236316 136613534313932666231616430663839336330663536326238633763343639372e706e67"样式="宽度：220像素； height: 118px;" />;<br />;Blazer提供SQL数据探索、图表/仪表板创建和共享工具，并具有只读用户设置等安全措施以进行查询保护。它支持定期检查调度、用户角色创建和将查询结果链接到外部页面。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#blazer-business-intelligence-made-simple" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39524327" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Mountaineer – Python 和 React 中的 Web 应用</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/piercefreeman/mountaineer</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T15:24:55.834273Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/piercefreeman/mountaineer"/>; <作者>; <名称>;icyfox</名称>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=icyfox</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/piercefreeman/mountaineer/ main/docs/media/ide_typehints.png" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;Mountaineer 是一个注重生产力的框架，用于使用 Python 和 React 构建 Web 应用程序，提供轻松的集成和开发人员工具。它通过提供服务器端渲染、本机 Typescript 支持和自动更新前端状态。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-mountaineer-webapps-in-python-and-react" target="_blank">;[summary]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39524874" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;表格数据的合成数据生成</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/sdv-dev/SDV< /id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T19:24:55.834807Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/sdv-dev/SDV"/>; <作者>; <名称>;skadamat</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=skadamat</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com /sdv-dev/SDV/stable/docs/images/SDV-logo.png" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;Synthetic Data Vault (SDV) 是一个 Python 库，用于使用机器学习创建合成数据，提供各种模型和评估工具。它允许数据生成、预处理、匿名化和应用约束，由 DataCebo 维护。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#synthetic-data- Generation-for-tabular-data" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39528192" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// /hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么随着年龄的增长，时间似乎过得更快</stitle>; <id>;https://invertedpassion.com/why-time-seems- to-pass-faster-as-we-age/</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T10:24:55.835288Z</更新>; <link href="https://invertedpassion.com/why-time-似乎-to-pass-faster-as-we-age/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;paraschopra</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=paraschopra</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章表明，随着年龄的增长，由于大脑注重效率，只存储新的经历并忽略可预测的事件，因此感觉时间越来越短。为了解决这个问题，人们应该寻求新奇的体验来保持大脑的活跃。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-time-seems-to-pass-faster-as-we-age" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39522249" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Show HN：我构建了一个名为 ingestr 的开源数据复制工具</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/bruin-数据/ingestr</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T15:24:55.836242Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/bruin-data/ingestr"/>; <作者>; <名称>;karakanb</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=karakanb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw .githubusercontent.com/bruin-data/ingestr/main/resources/demo.gif" style="宽度：220px；高度：106px；" />;<br />;Ingestr 是一个 CLI 工具，无需编码即可轻松地将数据从任何源提取到任何目的地。它利用 SQLAlchemy 和 dlt 团队的工作来简化后端管理和连接。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-i-built-an-open-source-data-copy-tool-known-ingestr" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39525071" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;考虑木爪</stitle>; <id>;https://beltmag.com/consider-the-pawpaw/< /id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T14:24:55.836726Z</更新>; <link href="https://beltmag.com/consider-the-pawpaw/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;PaulHoule< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=PaulHoule</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://beltmag.com/ wp-content/uploads/2024/02/Asimina_triloba-scaled.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：327px；" />;<br />;本文探讨了木瓜果的历史、波动的受欢迎程度和烹饪用途，强调了俄亥俄州木瓜节在推广其独特风味和潜力方面的作用。尽管木瓜味道丰富，营养价值高，但尚未得到充分利用，但通过节日和爱好者而受到关注。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#consider-the-pawpaw" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=39523641" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;社交媒体第一修正案案例</stitle>; <id>;https://www.lawfaremedia.org/article/supreme-court-oral-argument-preview-social-media-first-amendment-cases </id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T14:24:55.837219Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.lawfaremedia.org/article/supreme-court-oral-argument-preview-social- media-first-amendment-cases"/>; <author>; <name>;Mjadams</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Mjadams</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://lawfare-assets-new.azureedge.net/assets/images/default-source/article-images/screen-shot-2024-02-22-at-9.58。 25-am.png?sfvrsn=f8488560_5" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;美国最高法院将审理挑战德克萨斯州和佛罗里达州限制社交媒体内容审核法律的案件，这可能会重新定义第一修正案的权利。案件的焦点是这些法律是否构成强迫言论或国家审查，以及社交媒体平台是否可以被视为公共载体。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#social-media-first-amendment-cases" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=39513870" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;美国利用人工智能帮助寻找中东空袭目标</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2024-02-26/us -说-it-used-ai-to-help-find-targets-it-hit-in-iraq-syria-and-yemen</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T23:24:55.837694Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2024-02-26/us-says-it-used-ai-to-help-find-targets-it-hit-in- iraq-syria-and-yemen"/>; <author>; <name>;bluefishinit</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bluefishinit</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://assets.bwbx.io/images/users/iqjWHBFdfxIU/iOb2sSdFAikk/v1/1200x800.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;彭博社提供了信息交换网络，美军在最近的中东空袭中利用人工智能来精确定位目标。机器学习算法帮助识别了 2 月 2 日超过 85 次袭击的目标。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#us-used-ai-to-help-find-middle-east-targets-for -airstrikes" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39531348" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>; </content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;苹果取消电动汽车工作，将团队转向生成人工智能</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2024-02-27/apple-cancels-work-on-electric-car-shifts-team-to-generative-ai</ id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T19:24:55.838170Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2024-02-27/apple-cancels-work- on-electric-car-shifts-team-to-generative-ai"/>; <作者>; <名称>;coloneltcb</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=coloneltcb</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://assets.bwbx.io/images/users/iqjWHBFdfxIU/it.5KxtWk5Zw/v1/-1x-1.jpg" style="宽度：220px； height: 147px;" />;<br />;彭博社报道称，苹果公司暂停了长达十年的电动汽车项目，这让约 2,000 名相关员工感到惊讶。该内部公告由首席运营官杰夫·威廉姆斯 (Jeff Williams) 和副总裁凯文·林奇 (Kevin Lynch) 发布。 <a href=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/#apple-cancels-work-on-electric-car-shifts-team-to-generative-ai" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39528134" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;请求回顾</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.ian.stapletoncordas.co/2024/02/a-retrospective-on -请求</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T10:24:55.838652Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.ian.stapletoncordas.co/2024/02/a-retrospective-on- requests"/>; <author>; <name>;zdw</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zdw</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章批评了 python-requests 的内部项目结构，同时承认其用户友好的界面。它建议进行改进，例如基于协议的数据类以及与 SSL/TLS 配置的更好集成。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-retrospective-on-requests" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=39505597" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;植物园可使城市空气平均降温 5°C</stitle>; <id>;https://newatlas.com/environment/surrey-cooling-effects-green-spaces-waterways /</id>; <更新>;2024-02-27T14:24:55.839135Z</更新>; <link href="https://newatlas.com/environment/surrey-cooling-effects-green-spaces-waterways/" />; <author>; <name>;Brajeshwar</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Brajeshwar</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src ="https://assets.newatlas.com/dims4/default/74f79b9/2147483647/strip/true/crop/5616x3744+0+0/resize/1200x800!/quality/90/?url=http%3A%2F% 2Fnewatlas-brightspot.s3.amazonaws.com%2F8f%2Faf%2F6ea56ca8477d9798934b4a08a2df%2Fdepositphotos-18136723-xl.jpg" style="宽度：220 像素；高度：147 像素；" />;<br />;一项研究表明，将自然融入城市可以对抗气温上升，植物园可将城市内的气温降低高达 5°C。研究人员强调，针对有效的城市绿蓝灰基础设施进行具体规划的重要性，以确保长期的冷却效益。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#botanical-gardens-can-cool-city-air-by-an-average-of-5degc" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=39524164" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
